==== typedefHoisting (2 errors) ====
    
x.js(2,20): error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
x.js(5,11): error TS1003: Identifier expected.

==== x.js (2 errors) ====
    class C {
        /** @import {Bar} from "./y" */
                       ~~~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
        /** @typedef {Bar[]} Bars */
        /** @type {Bars} */
        foo = ["abc", "def"]
              ~
!!! error TS1003: Identifier expected.
        bar(/** @type {Bar} */ x) {
            return x
        }
    }
